name: Froglins
description:
RIGHT CLICK CARDS TO SEE THEIR EFFECTS

A Short Card game about frogs!

Drag a unit onto your lily pad to summon them

Summons will automatically attack the enemy that is in front of them (Prioritizes enemies closer to the center! so place tanks there)

Every floor has 3 waves

R to restart current floor with the same deck

ESC to return to main menu and start from scratch.

Credits to:
Derpyzza - Card Art
Zomare - Music
Ilias Lays (IlPrimy) - Programming + none card art
Freesound.org - sounds (all cc0)
